CodeList.Name: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised test name.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - Please include any additional information you wish about the above answers.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Any Additional Information

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been in an argument that was so out of control that someone got hurt?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Argument Where Someone Got Hurt

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you attended an AA or NA meeting?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Attended AA or NA Meeting

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been concerned that people will judge you for taking pain medication?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Concerned People Will Judge You

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others expressed concern over your use of medication?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Others Expressed Concern Over Medication Use

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SOAPR1-Felt Consumed to Get Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SOAPR1-Felt Consumed to Get Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt consumed by the need to get pain medication?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Felt Consumed to Get Pain Medication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt a craving for medication?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Felt Craving for Medication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt impatient with your doctors?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Felt Impatient With Doctors

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt that things are just too overwhelming that you can't handle them?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Felt That Things Are Overwhelming

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you had to borrow pain medications from your family or friends?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Borrowed Pain Medication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you counted pain pills to see how many are remaining?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Counted Pain Pills

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often do you feel bored?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Feel Bored

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have any of your close friends had a problem with alcohol or drugs?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Friends Had Problem

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often do you have mood swings?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Mood Swings

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been sexually abused?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Sexually Abused

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SOAPR1-How Often Taken More Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SOAPR1-How Often Taken More Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you taken more pain medication than you were supposed to?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Taken More Pain Medication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often is there tension in the home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Tension at Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others kept you from getting what you deserve?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Others Kept You From what You Deserve

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often, in your lifetime, have you had legal problems or been arrested?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Legal Problems or Arrested

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt a need for higher doses of medication to treat your pain?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Need Higher Doses of Medication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others told you that you had a bad temper?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Others Told You Bad Temper

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SOAPR1-Run Out of Pain Med Early
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SOAPR1-Run Out of Pain Med Early
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you run out of pain medication early?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Run Out of Pain Medication Early

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - Score.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Score

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others suggested that you have a drug or alcohol problem?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Others Suggested Drug or Alcohol Problem

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SOAPR1-Treated for Alcohol or Drug Prob
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SOAPR1-Treated for Alcohol or Drug Prob
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been treated for an alcohol or drug problem?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Treated for Alcohol or Drug Problem

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you worried about being left alone?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Worried About Being Left Alone

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised Test Name
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire SOAPP-R Test Name Terminology
